"Chaotic Beguiler":
"This is an emergency message for all ARKS.
We have located an area that we believe
to be some kind of Darker den.
Initial investigation has encountered not only
Darkers, but Natives, Mechs and Dragonkin.

We expect this to be a difficult mission, but
you must secure the Darker den ASAP.
――――――――――――――――――――
Clear by collecting [1000] Quest Points."
